DOC.brief_summary: With increase prevalence cellular phone , mobile technology provide important tool reach underserved population low middle income country . mHealth intervention offer promise improve maternal child health throughout reproductive health continuum contribute increase skilled birth attendance , family plan exclusive breastfeeding . We propose randomized clinical trial determine effect use mobile phone deliver SMS ( one-way ) versus interactive SMS dialogue ( two-way ) uptake reproductive neonatal health service maternal infant outcome
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Phone Messaging Improve Women 's Children 's Health ( Mobile WACh ) Kenya
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Access mobile phone Able read SMS message Willing receive SMS message Unwilling unable meet inclusion criterion
